author: Justin Kohls
text:
Knowledge network:
I am a current graduate student at DePaul University’s School of Public Service in Chicago, Illinois.  I will be graduating this November and as part of my degree program I am conducting research for a capstone project.  
My research is looking at ethics among managers and assistant managers within cities/villages that operate under the council-manager form of government across the United States.  I am collecting my own primary data and am hoping to get a minimum of 40 responses from managers.  The survey I have created should take no more than 15 minutes and can be accessed at the below link. 
If you have any questions, feel free to message me here or at jkohls@mail.depaul.edu or (612) 600-6228.
Anonymous Survey Link: 
https://qtrial2014.az1.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_agY3LYQevuHyzNH 
Thank you in advance for your time,
Justin Kohls
title: Request for Assistance from Managers/Asst. Managers in Capstone Research on Ethics
